meanings.definition: A computer system with two or more central processing units.
meanings.sent1: My new computer is a multiprocessor, which means it has more than one brain!
meanings.sent2: The multiprocessor in the server allows it to handle multiple tasks at the same time.
meanings.sent3: I wish I had a multiprocessor brain so I could do my homework while playing video games.
meanings.sent4: Her mind works like a multiprocessor, juggling different thoughts effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The multiprocessor setup makes the computer lightning fast and efficient.

meanings.definition: A device or system that uses multiple processors to perform tasks simultaneously.
meanings.sent1: The new smartphone is a multiprocessor, making it great for multitasking.
meanings.sent2: Companies use multiprocessors to speed up data processing and improve efficiency.
meanings.sent3: I never knew a multiprocessor could make my life so much easier until I got one.
meanings.sent4: His team worked together like a well-oiled multiprocessor, completing the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent5: The multiprocessor design allows the device to handle complex calculations with ease.
